Services.services_that_take_care: Services that take care of everything for you.

Banner.prevention: Prevent expensive costs and protect your home with ease
Banner.simplify: Forget unexpected repairs, take care of your home with Flix Home.

Home_to_work.title: How It Works
Home_to_work.description: Taking care of your home has never been easier. With Flix Home, prevent problems or solve them with fast services and maintenance plans tailored to your needs, all in one click.
Home_to_work.first_description: From urgent repairs to preventive plans, select what your home needs in a few clicks.
Home_to_work.second_description: Click to schedule and talk to our assistant on WhatsApp – fast and without bureaucracy.
Home_to_work.three_description: Receive confirmation from our team, who finalize the scheduling and payment with total security.
Home_to_work.four_description: Have the service completed by top professionals and save time and money in the future.

Services.title: Services that solve everything for you
Services.description: Keep your home spotless without effort. From cleaning to repairs, we are your trusted ally.
Services.button: Explore all services and solve it now!

Features.first_description: All professionals are trained and evaluated.
Features.four_description: We are available 24/7, 365 days a year.

Depoinments.title: What the first to trust Flix Home say
Depoinments.subtitle: Services that take care of everything for you
Depoinments.description: Everything you need to keep your home in order. We are your reliable partner to make your daily life easier.
Depoinments.first: The free diagnosis from Flix Home alerted me to a plumbing problem I didn't even know I had. I feel more at ease now.
Depoinments.second: With preventive maintenance, I've already avoided a breakdown in my heater. Flix Home really simplifies life!
Depoinments.three: I love the ease of scheduling everything via WhatsApp. The team is fast and makes me confident in the maintenance of my home.
Depoinments.four: I started with the free plan and already see the value of keeping my assets up to date. I recommend it to anyone who wants to avoid surprises!
Depoinments.five: Flix Home fixed a leak in the kitchen in record time. Now I'm trying the plan to prevent more headaches.
Depoinments.button: Talk to us and start today

Partners.title: Join Flix Home as a partner
Partners.description: Are you a qualified technician or do you have a small service company? Work with us, gain more customers and be part of a platform that values your experience. Receive requests directly on your mobile phone and increase your earnings without complications.

Initials.title: Protect your home today!
Initials.description: Forget expensive unforeseen events. With Flix Home, keep your assets up to date and live with more peace of mind.

Faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faqs.first_description: Flix Home is your solution to keep your home up to date without complications. We offer preventive maintenance plans to protect your residential assets, such as plumbing or electricity, and fast services for repairs or cleaning, all with trusted professionals.
Faqs.second_description: It's simple: choose the service or plan on our website and click to schedule via WhatsApp. Our virtual assistant collects the details in minutes, and our team confirms the time and payment. Need to adjust? Just contact us through the same channel.
Faqs.three: Does Flix Home offer a service guarantee?
Faqs.three_description: Yes, all services performed by our partners have a satisfaction guarantee. If something doesn't go as expected, contact us via WhatsApp and we'll resolve it quickly.
Faqs.four: Who are the Flix Home professionals?
Faqs.four_description: Our professionals are qualified technicians, from independent workers to small companies, selected for their experience and reliability. They are part of our network to ensure your home is in good hands.
Faqs.five: What services are available at Flix Home?
Faqs.five_description: We offer preventive maintenance for assets such as plumbing, electricity, and appliances, in addition to on-demand services such as urgent repairs and deep cleaning. See all options on our website!
Faqs.six_description: Our plans — Freemium, Essential, and Family — include diagnostics and regular maintenance for your assets. Start for free with Freemium and choose what best suits your home.
Faqs.seven: How much does it cost to join Flix Home?
Faqs.seven_description: The Freemium Plan is free to start, with initial diagnostics. Paid plans start at €15/month, with fixed prices and no surprises. See the details on the website!
Faqs.height: Can I cancel or change my plan?
Faqs.height_description: Yes, you can adjust or cancel your plan at any time via WhatsApp. We want you to have total flexibility.

Plans.description_home: Do you want to prevent long-term problems? Choose the maintenance plan that keeps your home safe from the unexpected:
Plans.title: Do you want to prevent long-term problems?
Plans.subtitle: choose the plan that keeps your home protected from unforeseen events

Plans.description: Avoid unexpected expenses and headaches with our preventive plans. With regular inspections and specialized maintenance, we guarantee more safety, comfort, and peace of mind for you and your family. Choose the ideal plan and protect your home before small problems become big concerns!
Plans.first_description: Free diagnosis of your assets to start.
Plans.second_description: Annual maintenance of an essential asset.
Plans.three_description: Complete protection for all your assets.
Plans.button: Start today and protect your assets

Footer.description: We simplify people's lives by offering high-quality domestic services with transparency and trust.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Flix Home Privacy Policy (Portugal)
PrivacyPolicy.subtitle: Making home care simple and accessible.

1.title: Introduction
1.description: Flix Home, headquartered at Travessa Fonte de Contumil 274, Portugal, is committed to protecting the privacy and personal data of its customers, partners, and website visitors. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal data, in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable Portuguese law. By using our services or visiting our website, you agree to the practices described herein. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

2.title: Personal Data Collected
2.description:
Flix Home may collect the following types of personal data:
- Identification Information: Name, email address, phone number, home address.
- Payment Information: Credit card data or other payment methods (processed by third parties).
- Technical Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, browsing data.
- Usage Information: Interactions with the site, services used, preferences.
- Communication Information: Messages sent via WhatsApp or other support channels.

3.title: Purposes of Data Collection
3.description:
Personal data is collected for the following purposes:
- Service Delivery: Scheduling and performing preventive and on-demand maintenance services.
- Communication: Sending confirmations, reminders, and service updates.
- Service Improvement: Analyzing site and service usage to enhance user experience.
- Marketing: Sending newsletters, promotions, and information about new services, with your consent.
- Legal Compliance: Fulfilling legal and regulatory obligations.

4.title: Legal Basis for Data Processing
4.description:
Flix Home processes your personal data based on the following legal grounds:
- Contract Execution: To provide the requested services.
- Consent: For marketing activities and promotional communications.
- Legitimate Interest: To improve services and ensure website security.
- Legal Obligation: To comply with applicable laws.

5.title: Data Sharing
5.description:
Flix Home may share personal data with:
- Operational Partners: Technicians and companies that perform the services.
- Payment Processors: To handle financial transactions.
- Legal Authorities: When required by law or to protect legal rights.
All partners are bound by confidentiality and data protection agreements.

6.title: International Data Transfers
6.description: Personal data may be transferred outside the European Economic Area (EEA), but only to countries that provide an adequate level of protection or under appropriate safeguards, such as Standard Contractual Clauses.

7.title: Data Subject Rights
7.description:
Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:
- Access: Request a copy of your personal data.
- Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data.
- Erasure: Request deletion of your data, where applicable.
- Restriction: Restrict processing of your data under certain circumstances.
- Portability: Receive your data in a structured format and transfer it to another controller.
- Objection: Object to the processing of your data for marketing or other purposes.
- Withdrawal of Consent: Revoke your consent at any time without affecting prior lawful processing.
To exercise these rights, contact us at support@flixhome.app.

8.title: Data Security
8.description: Flix Home implements technical and organizational measures to protect personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or destruction. These measures include encryption, access control, and regular backups.

9.title: Data Retention
9.description: Personal data is retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected or as required by law. After this period, the data will be anonymized or securely deleted.

10.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
10.description: Our website uses cookies to enhance user experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings. For more information, see our Cookie Policy (https://www.flixhome.app/politica-de-cookies).

11.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy
11.description: Flix Home reserves the right to update this policy periodically. Any changes will be published on our website, and the latest version will always be available.

12.title: Contact
12.description:
If you have questions or concerns about this policy or how your data is handled, contact us:
- Email: geral@flixhome.app
- Address: Travessa Fonte de Contumil 274
- Phone: +351 939 936 372
You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Comissão Nacional de Proteção de Dados (CNPD), the supervisory authority in Portugal.

1.title: Introduction
1.description: Flix Home uses cookies and similar technologies on its website to improve user experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content. This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can manage your preferences. By browsing our website, you agree to the use of cookies as described here, unless you have disabled them in your browser settings.

2.title: What are Cookies?
2.description: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when you visit a website. They allow the website to recognize your device on future visits and enhance your browsing experience.

3.title: Types of Cookies Used
3.description:
Flix Home uses the following types of cookies:
- Essential Cookies: Necessary for the basic operation of the site, such as navigation and access to secure areas. Without them, the site will not function properly. Example: Session cookies to keep you logged in.
- Performance Cookies: Collect data on how users interact with the site, helping us improve its functionality. Example: Google Analytics to analyze traffic.
- Functionality Cookies: Allow remembering choices such as language or region, providing a personalized experience. Example: Cookies that save language preferences.
- Marketing Cookies: Used to display relevant ads and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Example: Remarketing cookies for personalized ads.

4.title: How We Use Cookies
4.description:
Cookies help us to:
- Ensure the safe and efficient operation of the website.
- Analyze website usage and improve its performance.
- Personalize your experience by remembering your preferences.
- Provide relevant ads based on your interests.

5.title: Consent
5.description: When you visit our website, you will see a cookie banner asking for your consent to non-essential cookies. You can accept, refuse, or customize your choices. Essential cookies do not require consent, as they are necessary for the website to function.

6.title: Managing Cookies
6.description:
You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings at any time. Note that disabling essential cookies may affect the functionality of the site. Please refer to your browser's instructions:
- Google Chrome
- Mozilla Firefox
- Safari
- Microsoft Edge

7.title: Third-Party Cookies
7.description: Our website may use third-party cookies, such as Google Analytics or advertising platforms. These third parties collect data in accordance with their own privacy policies.

8.title: Changes to the Cookie Policy
8.description: Flix Home may update this policy periodically. Changes will be posted on the website, and the most recent version will always be available.

9.title: Contact
9.description:
If you have any questions about this policy or the use of cookies, please contact us:
- Email: geral@flixhome.app
- Address: Travessa Fonte de Contumil 274
- Phone: +351 939 936 372
